website_summaries.verdict: A traditional style rocking chair with a solid build. Would suit contemporary and traditional decors alike.
pros: The rubberwood and plywood construction is sturdy and durable
The dark espresso finish and classic look complements both modern and traditional homes
Seat base is contoured for a more comfortable experience
cons: A small number of buyers received damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lovely wooden rocker. Easily put it together in 30 minutes or so. The wood is solid and soft (no need for sanding), not at all cheap or flimsy feeling. Has a light scent of stain but not a bad one like some of the furniture I’ve recently purchased for the nursery which took days to air out. It’s quite comfortable even without a cushion. I’m 5’2 and 9 months pregnant, my husband is 6’0 and 180 lbs, and we both found the chair comfortable and supportive. I’m considering buying another one for the 2nd floor.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble and looks great. This was one of the less expensive rockers I had seen, but it is great quality and a great buy. It was perfect for our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews about products that I buy on Amazon, but I have been so pleased with this rocking chair that I wanted to give it five stars. It is considerably more sturdy and comfortable than I expected. The service was excellent, and the workmanship of the chair is top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for four months and it's been wonderful. It fits well in my very small nursery.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMR

customer_reviews.title: Good rocking chair for a nursery.
customer_reviews.text: This was not too hard to assemble. Just took a little time. It has been sturdy enough. My daughter has used it for a little over 3 months now. You will need chair pads
customer_reviews.author: R. Rolison

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Easy to put together. Edit 3/4/19 - Frustrated that not even a year later the screws are coming loose and several of the caps have popped off. Was able to tighten screws, but I guess this will be a regular thing to upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bouas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rocking chair
customer_reviews.text: This rocking chair is wonderful! I wanted to wait to review it till my son was born. It has held up well in the 3 months of use. It’s comfortable, I’m able to nurse my son in it and I was able to assemble it on my own. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great, used to rock a newborn to sleep every night. Very sturdy and easy to put together. We initially received a defective screw, and when I let the company know I was personally called by the owner the next day who made sure everything was made right. Great experience and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really espresso
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't as "espresso" as other furniture I have in the same stated color, but it will be great to rock my toddler and Newborn! Slight issue with FedEx delivery, but it was resolved same day. Takes about 3 hours to put together at 36+4 i love real rocking chairs. This is my 2ed Hayneedle rocker. This one is going in the kids room, the first is the only place I like to sit in the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: rocking chair
customer_reviews.text: beautiful well made wooden rocker with screws no glue very please with this product and is a large rocker thank you mama and baby will love it
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Schulz

product_meta.title: Belham Living Wood Nursery Rocker - Espresso
